text: Michael Anthony Singletary (born September 19, 1988) is an American professional basketball player for Mono Vampire of the Thailand Basketball League. ==References== ==External links== * * *Texas Tech Red Raiders bio * Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:American expatriate basketball people in Belgium Category:American expatriate basketball people in Montenegro Category:American expatriate basketball people in the Philippines Category:American expatriate basketball people in Thailand Category:Barako Bull Energy players Category:Basketball players from Texas Category:Erie BayHawks (2008–2017) players Category:KK Mornar Bar players Category:Osaka Evessa players Category:Philippine Basketball Association imports Category:Power forwards (basketball) Category:Rio Grande Valley Vipers players Category:San Miguel Beermen players Category:Small forwards Category:Sportspeople from El Paso, Texas Category:Texas Tech Red Raiders basketball players Category:RBC Pepinster players Category:ASEAN Basketball League players Category:Expatriate sportspeople in Thailand Category:American men's basketball players
title: Mike Singletary (basketball)
